flawed_nl_solution:
A total of 10*2=<<10*2=20>>20 students went on the field trip.
Some chaperones showed up, letting the group grow to 20+5=<<20+5=25>>25 individuals.
The teachers had to come as well, making the group as big as 25+2=<<25+2=72>>72 individuals.
When the school day ended, 72-10=<<72-10=62>>62 individuals were left.
A couple of chaperones followed suit, leaving 62-2=<<62-2=60>>60 people at the zoo.
#### 60

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 72. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
